text:
Thanks for the report.

All the connectors (apart from BIO) could be considered to be simulating blocking in one way or another so I don't think that that really adds very much. It certainly makes no measureable performance impact.

I've simply removed all references to simulated and fixed the language a bit.

The fix has been applied to trunk, 8.0.x (for 8.0.27 onwards) and 7.0.x (for 7.0.65 onwards).
creator: markt@apache.org
